review: Easy to use and works great
author: R.U.happy

review: Love it. Easy to use and the iPhone app makes it more convenient to use.
author: Santos Maisonet

review: It seems to work ok but Netflix freezes all the time. Amazon prime seems ok but we had a few buffering issues with that as well.
author: kristie kollinger

review: Easy set up.  I think the interface it a little klunky but once I get used to it I'm sure it will be fine.
author: Rolfe E. Ashworth "Navy Proud"

review: It does everything it says. Very happy with firestick that I use it in my bedroom.
author: Heather Stout

review: My husband accidently ordered Amazon prime. We didn't know it until our trial period was up. (when I got the bill) So I ordered the fire stick because we couldn't watch movies on anything but my laptop. We do love it now that we can watch it on the tv. Lots of movies we have never seen.
author: Sandy K
